price: (Abagabo babo) bazajya begama ku misego y’icyatsi, n’amagodora meza anepa atatse neza.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
